featured.text: They are brave enough to help in an emergency while others may stand by.
The city declared a state of emergency and began aerial spraying of a pesticide to kill the mosquitoes, even though residents argued that the pesticide could be more dangerous than the disease.
In the cross-lake swimming race, a boat will be _____ in case of an emergency.
They have been used to mark the hours of the day, to call the 27 to prayer, and to signal emergency situations such as fires and invasions.

definition.zh_def: 緊急情況，通常需要立即的行動或處理。
definition.en_def: A serious, unexpected, and often dangerous situation requiring immediate action.
definition.example: In case of an emergency, call 911 for help.
